class_notes: (Instructor: Amy Valdez-Barker) (ON CAMPUS) (This course aims to help students understand the Methodist movement from Wesley to the global community it is today.  "With over 80 Methodist, Wesleyan and related Uniting and United Churches representing over 80 million members in 138 countries" noted from the World Methodist Council's website, there has been an expansion of Christianity through the Methodist movement over the past three hundred years.)
course_description: Special topic or one-time offering courses led by Candler regular and visiting faculty. Prerequisites may be required and are noted on the course schedule when applicable.
schedule_location: W 2:30pm-5:30pm in Rita Anne Rollins Building_421
